timeline.bodyText: We usually don't have these tags here. Please remove.
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: oh oversight, should have swipe all these generated comments
replies.author: yue9944882

timeline.bodyText: Please add class loader matcher as well. There are plenty of examples in other instrumenters.
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: i wrapped the name matcher w/ extendsClass(..), is that what you're expecting?
replies.author: yue9944882
iNikem

timeline.bodyText: Can you modify incoming parameter interceptors and add a new one there? I don't know this API, so don't have any hard preferences :)
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText:
the interceptors are immutable so i have to craft a new list instead of updating in-place..
https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/blob/d5b80572498122bb45c830c74f89b871dbbdfc92/kubernetes/src/main/java/io/kubernetes/client/openapi/ApiClient.java#L93
replies.author: yue9944882

replies.bodyText: You can change this method to Advice.OnMethodEnter, change interceptors argument to readOnly = false and construct new list which includes both old value of interceptors and TracingInterceptor
replies.author: iNikem

timeline.bodyText:
Does it make sense to reuse our normal okhttp decorator?
https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-java-instrumentation/blob/master/instrumentation/okhttp/okhttp-3.0/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/auto/instrumentation/okhttp/v3_0/OkHttpClientDecorator.java#L26
It's currently not that much code but could grow into more and more duplication
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: yeah i actually started by trying to import the okhttp3 instrument code, but in the end it turns out that there're only 20-ish lines of duplication.. additionally am not sure if cross-referencing between instrumenting libraries are legal in the project?
replies.author: yue9944882

timeline.bodyText: Make everything except the instrumentation and interceptor package private
timeline.author: anuraaga
